trans-unit.source: Represents the ConfigurableForwardingLogger, a pre-fabricated forwarding logger to be used when building projects on a multi-proc or multi-core system.
trans-unit.target: 表示 ConfigurableForwardingLogger，它是在多處理器或多核心系統上建置專案時所使用的預先製作的轉送記錄器。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Writing Multi-Processor-Aware Loggers](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ff987d1b-1798-4803-9ef6-cc8fcc263516).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[撰寫能夠辨識多處理器的記錄器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ff987d1b-1798-4803-9ef6-cc8fcc263516)。

trans-unit.source: You can use the provided ConfigurableForwardingLogger, or you can create your own custom forwarding loggers.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用提供的 ConfigurableForwardingLogger，或您可以建立您自己自訂的轉送記錄器。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ConfigurableForwardingLogger" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ConfigurableForwardingLogger" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the build engine allows node loggers to forward messages to the central logger.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定建置引擎是否允許節點記錄器將訊息轉送至中央記錄器。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventRedirector" /> object to forward the events.
trans-unit.target: 用來轉送事件的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventRedirector" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The event arguments.
trans-unit.target: 事件引數。

trans-unit.source: Forwards the specified event to the central logger.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的事件轉送至中央記錄器。

trans-unit.source: Initialize the Forwarding Table with the default values.
trans-unit.target: 使用預設值初始化轉送表格。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource" /> object to provide the build events.
trans-unit.target: 用來提供建置事件的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Enlists the console logger for all build events.
trans-unit.target: 登記所有建置事件的主控台記錄器。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource" /> object to provide the build events.
trans-unit.target: 用來提供建置事件的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The node ID of the event source.
trans-unit.target: 事件來源的節點 ID。

trans-unit.source: Enlists the console logger for all build events.
trans-unit.target: 登記所有建置事件的主控台記錄器。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unique identifier (Node ID) to which the logger is attached.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定記錄器附加至的唯一識別項 (節點 ID)。

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier to the node.
trans-unit.target: 節點的唯一識別項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the parameters for the ConfigurableForwardingLogger.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 ConfigurableForwardingLogger 的參數。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the logger parameters.
trans-unit.target: 表示記錄器參數的字串。

trans-unit.source: The console logger takes a single parameter to suppress the output of the errors and warnings summary at the end of a build.
trans-unit.target: 主控台記錄器採用單一參數來抑制錯誤和警告摘要結尾的組建輸出。

trans-unit.source: Closes the configurable forwarding logger.
trans-unit.target: 關閉可設定的轉送記錄器。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the level of detail to show in the event log.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在事件記錄檔中顯示的詳細資料層級。

trans-unit.source: a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.LoggerVerbosity" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.LoggerVerbosity" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The console logger takes a single parameter to suppress the output of the errors and warnings summary at the end of a build.
trans-unit.target: 主控台記錄器採用單一參數來抑制錯誤和警告摘要結尾的組建輸出。
